settings.heading: A mindful spa in the heart of Pererenan

settings.text:
Nestled in Bali's tropical embrace, our contemporary spa blends opulence with mindfulness.

We source the finest, organic ingredients globally, supporting local trade practices. Our small batch blends preserve therapeutic benefits. Committed to sustainability, we never test on animals. Indulge in treatments free from artificial chemicals and preservatives, a pure celebration of well-being.

Welcome to a conscious retreat, where luxury meets ethical care.
hidden content that appears on click so put anything you want on to here

custom_css: .media > img {object-fit: cover; object-position: center 84%; transition: opacity 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94);}

settings.heading: cream bath
settings.description: Experience the luxury of this treatment knowing that our carefully crafted hair mask is completely free from harmful toxins. We have meticulously selected pure, clean ingredients, ensuring that your hair is nourished and revitalized without any compromise. Relax as the hydrating properties of aloe vera, the nourishing essence of avocado extracts, and the replenishing power of squalane work their magic, deeply nourishing every strand. Unwind with a soothing head massage, knowing that your hair is being treated with utmost care and without any harmful chemicals.

settings.heading: scalp massage
settings.description:
Experience pure bliss with our invigorating scalp treatment. Let our skilled therapists release tension in your neck, head and shoulders, while increasing blood flow to cleanse your scalp and hair. Our specially formulated scalp oil, infused with avocado and ginseng extracts, provides nourishment for a revitalized scalp and healthy hair. Treat yourself to this transformative experience and embrace the rejuvenating power of our
Scalp Massage.

settings.heading: dry head massage
settings.description: Indulge in the soothing bliss of our Dry Head Massage. Let our skilled therapists work their magic as they gently massage your scalp, relieving tension and promoting relaxation. This oil-free treatment is designed to enhance scalp circulation, ease headaches, and leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

settings.heading: the healing act
settings.description: Experience a traditional Balinese body massage incorporating rhythmic long connections strokes. Recommended for treating stress, muscle pain, sleep problems and anxiety. Ease into mindful meditation while your body and psyche are transported to a state of Tri Hita Karana – the Balinese concept of union between people, environment, and the Gods.

settings.heading: reflexology
settings.description: Relieve tension and feel the rush of a high tide as nourished blood flows from your soles to carry away toxins and normalize compromised circulation as the body begins to heal itself.

settings.heading: a salty affair
settings.description: Fortify your connection with the ocean and its rich mineral content by experiencing our custom blended aromatic full body Sea Salt Scrub – a natural exfoliant. Removes toxins from your skin while buffing away the top layer to create an irresistible glow. Enjoy a gentle finger dance on your face and scalp whilst being exfoliated. Finish off with a hydrating body moisturizer leaving your skin vibrant and supple.

settings.heading: natural dreams
settings.description: Treat yourself to a rejuvenating luxury facial that embraces the healing properties of nature’s most hydrating ingredients. Our exquisite treatment is carefully crafted with plant-based, toxic-free elements, such as Avocado oil, Moringa Oil, Frankincense, and Turmeric. This all-encompassing facial experience encompasses a gentle scrub for exfoliation, a nourishing mask for revitalization, and a refreshing toner to complete the ritual. Immerse yourself in the beauty of a facial that cares for your skin with utmost purity, leaving you with a natural, radiant glow.

settings.heading: therapeutic
settings.description: Revitalize your nails with our Therapeutic Plant-Based Manicure, a wellness-focused experience that embraces the power of nature. We prioritize your well-being by using only plant-based, non-toxic products throughout the treatment. Our skilled technicians expertly shape and buff your nails, ensuring a flawless result. Indulge in a gentle exfoliation that leaves your hands feeling velvety smooth, using plant-based ingredients to nourish and renew your skin. Choose (or not) from our collection of stunning nail polishes, all made from plant-based formulas that are free from harmful chemicals. Relax and unwind with a soothing hand massage using our specially crafted, plant-based hand cream, enriched with botanical extracts for deep hydration. Experience the perfect harmony of wellness and nature with our Therapeutic Plant-Based Manicure, where your health and the environment are our top priorities.
